title: BlackRock, Nvidia, and Microsoft lead $40B takeover of Aligned Data Centers to power the AI boom
description: The consortium, including xAI, GIP, MGX, Temasek, and Kuwait Investment Authority, is acquiring Aligned Data Centers in a $40 billion deal, marking the first major move under their $100 billion AI Infrastructure Partnership. title: Kim Kardashian breaks hearts as she uses AI to place late dad next to her at graduation
description: Kim Kardashian used artificial intelligence to pay tribute to her late father Robert Kardashian this week - 22 years after his death.
content:

title: Train AI to earn extra cash- Fast Company
description: Uber is offering quick tasks to drivers and couriers, like uploading photos and video recordings, which will feed its artificial intelligence models.
content:
The ride-hail app announced on Thursday a new pilot program that will offer gig workers the opportunity to train artificial intelligence (AI) through so-called “digital tasks.”

title: AI, the greatest boon for every introvert
description: Artificial intelligence offers a new form of companionship. It provides a private social life for those who find human interaction challenging. AI allows for discussions and advice without the pressures of social engagement. This technology offers a refuge from unwanted conversations and obligations. It is a welcome development for many individuals seeking a different social experience.

title: OpenAI To xAI: 10 Loss-Making Startups That Are Now Nearing $1-Trillion Valuation, Thanks To AI Frenzy
description: A year-long surge in artificial intelligence investment has propelled 10 loss-making startups to a combined valuation nearing $1 trillion, according to a media report. The rapid rise, fuelled by investor enthusiasm and a rush to dominate the next wave of computing, is prompting growing concerns that the private AI market is overheating — potentially sowing the seeds for a bubble that could ripple through the wider economy.
content:

title: US STOCKS-Wall St falls as financial stocks slide
description: Wall Street's main indexes dropped on Thursday, led by declines in financial stocks, while earlier gains in semiconductor shares on renewed optimism about artificial intelligence faded. The S&P 500 financials index declined 2%.
content:

title: Numbers picked by ChatGPT earn Michigan woman a $100,000 lottery prize
description: A Michigan woman used artificial intelligence program ChatGPT to generate a set of lottery numbers that earned her a $100,000 prize from a Powerball drawing.
content:
Oct. 16 (UPI) -- A Michigan woman used artificial intelligence program ChatGPT to generate a set of lottery numbers that earned her a $100,000 prize.
